name: Ultimate Packer for eXecutables File
summary: Learn about .UPX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Ultimate Packer for eXecutables automatically unpacks UPX files when they are executed. On some operating systems, it stores the unpacked file in memory using the in-place technique. On other operating systems, it creates a temporary file using the extraction technique.
NOTE: UPX files rarely use a ".upx" file extension. Rather, they most often use their original file extension after being compressed.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
